userTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Users (email NVARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY, password NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
todosTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ToDos (id NVARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY, title NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, isCompleted BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, isUpdated BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT 0);
migrationsTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Migrations (migrationName NVARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
